sourcesContent:
Book was not added to your library. Please, try again!
Book title is required
Book author is required
Book description is required
Description needs to be at least 30 chars
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-new-book', templateUrl: './new-book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-book.component.css'] }) export class NewBookComponent { }
